page.title: 11Alcester Sports Complex
page.content: A 100,000 scheme has been announced to change Alcester Rugby Club into a multi-sports complex.It includes four flood-lit, all-weather courts and a hockey pitch, as well as rugby pitches. Other facilities such as those for archery will be developed later. Work is likely to start on the club house first to provide two sets of changing rooms, a large lounge and a bar at a cost of 40,000. The scheme was announced by Rugby Club officials and Alcester's newly formed Tennis Club committee. At present the nearest outdoor centre is 8 miles away, so the complex will be an asset to the area. It will not compete with the Alcester Sports Hall because this provides only for indoor activities such as squash, badminton and volley-ball.
